title: How to Spot Common Scams in Crypto 🔍👁 (And Avoid Them!) 👌 Plus: Pig Butchering? 🐷 🗡
description:
⭐ TOP 10 TOOLS TO SECURE YOUR CRYPTO!! ⭐  

1. 🔐 Ledger ► https://bit.ly/Ledger-x1
Secure your crypto with the #1 Hardware Wallet!
   ⚡💰 Shop: “Nano S Plus” only $79!  

2. ⛰️ NordVPN ► https://bit.ly/NordVPN-x1
Add an extra layer of security: browse safely & securely!
   ⚡💰 Get: 70% off with +1 month FREE!  

3. 🔑 BC Vault ► https://bit.ly/BCVault-x1
Hardware wallet with unique options & safety perks!  

4. 📱 Efani SIM ► https://bit.ly/Efani-x1
Protect from “SIM swap” risk: the #1 secure cell plan!
   ⚡💰 Only: $99/mo (with $5mil insurance)  

5. 💻 Malwarebytes ► https://bit.ly/Malwarebytes-x1
Protect your identity, files, system and more!  

6. Yubikey 🏧  ► https://bit.ly/Yubikey-x1
Strong two factor authentication device! Tap and go!     

7. Ledger CryptoSteel Capsule Solo & BillFODL 🔥
Solid steel accessories to protect your recovery phrases!
   ► https://bit.ly/Ledger-Casey-113b
   ► https://bit.ly/Ledger-Casey-113c 

8. ProtonMail 📧 ► https://bit.ly/ProtonMail-Casey-113a
Free encrypted email based in Switzerland (+VPN!)   

9. 🧾 Shieldfolio ► https://bit.ly/Shieldfolio-x1
Get the most secure offline crypto storage solution!
   ⚡💰 20% off code: CRYPTOCASEY  

10. CTemplar 📧 ► https://bit.ly/CTemplar-Casey-113a
Anonymous email, encrypted, secure Icelandic Law!

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ 

COMMON SCAMS IN CRYPTO RIGHT NOW!! 🔐  

Hello, fam! Crypto Casey, here 👋 and I'm on a mission to improve people’s lives through #crypto education. In this important video, we discuss crypto #security and common ways people can lose their investments. We dig into common scams that occur, and explore the best way we can ensure the security of our crypto, and boost our sense of safety. Let's dive in!  

Be sure to Subscribe 🔔, Like 👍, and Share 🔗 this video! 

Then sit back and enjoy an informational binge session watching my other how-to videos on crypto, blockchain & #finance:
